info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sytadin.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Date: Wed, 08 Sep 2021 09:53:55 GMT
Server: Apache
Vary: Accept-Encoding,User-Agent
Via: 1.1 www.sytadin.fr
X-Pad: avoid browser bug






























	

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"

	<head>
		<title>Sytadin : l'état du trafic en Île-de-France en temps réel</title>

		<meta name="keywords" content="" />
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
		<meta name="robots" content="index, follow" />
		<meta name="revisit-after" content="7 days" />
